experience.title: Business Development Associate
experience.description: Impact is a fitness+kindness mobile app where every step walked or jogged raises money for a social cause. The ImpactRun team partners with corporates and non-profits and creates causes for users to run or walk for. The corporate sponsors then raise funds from their Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) budgets corresponding to the distance covered for that cause. NGOs use these funds to create impact at the grassroots level. Impact helped me to learn more about CSR work and business development.
experience.description_html: Impact is a fitness+kindness mobile app where every step walked or jogged raises money for a social cause. The ImpactRun team partners with corporates and non-profits and creates causes for users to run or walk for. The corporate sponsors then raise funds from their Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) budgets corresponding to the distance covered for that cause. NGOs use these funds to create impact at the grassroots level. Impact helped me to learn more about CSR work and business development.

experience.title: Referral Coordinate
